Streamline your reading with EZ-Summarizer, the Chrome extension that turns lengthy content into concise insights. Highlight text on any webpage, right-click, and generate instant summaries powered by advanced AI. With a clean, intuitive popup interface, you can also access and manage your summary history effortlessly.

Getting started is simple: all you need is your own OpenAI API key.  This solution is perfect for students, researchers, and professionals.
